name: Solitaire 3D - Solitaire Game
description:
Solitaire 3D brings the classic Solitaire card game, also known as Klondike or Patience, to the modern world with stunning graphics and addicting gameplay. Play fun brain teasers to test your Solitaire skills with challenging games that you can customize at any time.

For fans of Solitaire classic, Spider Solitaire, FreeCell solitaire, Mahjong or any other free Solitaire game, play classic Solitaire with custom decks and backgrounds, upload your high scores to the online leaderboards and enjoy free card games with Solitaire 3D.

How to play solitaire:

Solitaire 3D is a classic Solitaire game revamped for a modern world. Players must drag cards onto any card of the opposite suite and of one greater value. This free solitaire game consists of multiple rounds where you must click on a face-down cards from the stack or deck to flip into play. Click solitaire cards to move it onto the opposite suite and move Aces into the suite stacks at the top of the game. Move King cards of any suite to start empty card stacks and continue building up the stack. Click on the deck each round to cycle through the solitaire cards to get more matches. Once all Aces are in suite stacks, and the King stacks are finished, the solitaire cards will fly together to complete the suite stack.

Solitaire 3D features:

Solitaire - Classic Gameplay, Modern Look
★ Classic Solitaire that lets you fix mistakes with full undo and redo history to replay your previous moves.
★ Custom settings like card game selection and automatic animated play to increase card games speed.

3D Solitaire with Stunning Visuals
★ Classic Solitaire with fluid and beautiful 3D card game visuals to bring each solitaire game to life.
★ Solitaire 3D offers graphic options like card games speed, motion blur, shadows and colored highlights.

Brain Teasers – Play Fun Brain Games
★ Solitaire is the original logic puzzle – fans of Mahjong and classic Solitaire will stay mentally fit with this game!
★ Free Solitaire games of any difficulty available for Solitaire veterans and players who want to challenge their card playing skills.
★ Addicting games with normal or Vegas scoring, for an authentic board game experience. 

Free Online Play and Leaderboards
★ Play challenging games online to compete for leaderboards, game stats and high scores.
★ 3D Solitaire wherever you are! Transfer scores between devices and save scores through Google Play Services cloud storage.

Solitaire 3D is the ultimate free solitaire game available for your mobile device, or tablet.

Download Solitaire and bring the classic brain teaser everywhere you go!

Internet Access and External Storage privileges are required to download extra decks to Solitaire 3D, post high scores and save between devices.
